author: Andrew Freedman, Lauren Tierney
title: The silver lining to coronavirus lockdowns: air quality is improving
description: There's a benefit to the coronavirus stay at home orders: cleaner air.
content: The coronavirus pandemic has put much of the world into lockdown, with factories going idle and city streets turning into eerily empty walkways. With the case count and death toll still climbing, its unlikely that countries will be able to flick a switch and … [+5344 chars]
